Text: Thanks.  But would rather have the hosting and banter included.  Not a fan of the fade in and outs.

Sorry, didn't see the other version: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6038485/HOWARD_STERN_-_Paul_McCartney_Live___The_Apollo_-Concert_Version

Thanks.

The whole point is so you don't have to sit through a half hour of horrible radio hosts blabbering over how much they love McCartney every single time you want to listen to just one song.

The fading in and out whether you're a fan of it or not would sound retarded and sloppy without it.

This is for people who want to go back and hear certain songs but not fast forward through hosting and pointless banter.
